title: Monopolist innovation causes P fall, Q rise

content.question: A monopolist introduces a technological innovation that lowers the marginal cost and average cost of production. The price of the good and the level of output are most likely to change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Price Level of Output Remain constant Remain constant
Price Level of Output Remain constant Increase
Price Level of Output Increase Decrease
Price Level of Output Decrease Increase
Price Level of Output Decrease Remain constant

content.answer: Price Level of Output Decrease Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
